
GNC 
contract: 0x817f0c42831934fe10b89f545f7a1ab5ff1679e1

JWK
contract: 0x93Ab43dFb51Baf5b2915E91CebabcCDA455dB44C

1. chl 블럭넘버찾기
<<< 요청

>>> 응답



2. 블럭조회 (timestamp: 생성시간, 트랜잭션목록)
<<< 요청
{	
	"jsonrpc":"2.0"
,	"method":"eth_getBlockByNumber"
,	"params": [ "0x542faf", false ]
,	"id":1
}
>>> 응답
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "id": 1,
    "result": {
        "difficulty": "0xca549791",
        "extraData": "0xd88301081a846765746888676f312e31302e34856c696e7578",
        "gasLimit": "0x7a1200",
        "gasUsed": "0x19f7d0",
        "hash": "0x8b80547a6889791992c567ccb0ca3c731740ab7090da85419d8f0ebcca1a5336",
        "logsBloom": "",
        "miner": "0x942b3eafe6b87bf7326c4e03921e3b25eba7c966",
        "mixHash": "0x181f34152c7521fe7e8ca85d2c31ade19d285947d1779bc28637f75e3c82bff6",
        "nonce": "0x67c2c94b44268e9b",
        "number": "0x542faf",
        "parentHash": "0x6e7adc0eb8b12cd7fe18182f5f5d343892a833cc5472c07e98937eb9d0c8f402",
        "receiptsRoot": "0x63b2ada8aa5cc53f4f709edf38d1bdec05cb0e77a581078c7de0aab93a2775ba",
        "sha3Uncles": "0x1dcc4de8dec75d7aab85b567b6ccd41ad312451b948a7413f0a142fd40d49347",
        "size": "0x1547",
        "stateRoot": "0x60b2ca8c3d2656e7f0c945ed791f650f1a2d404fb77622e044a276cdaef6f67e",
        "timestamp": "0x5cca38d6",
        "totalDifficulty": "0x4524afdc2e6e46",
        "transactions": [
            "0x71ce11bbec401eff4a04ab7c1d2c0de28b9ddbc813c790026b1c82170d440852",
            "0x0a25b6871bbe4dcb1866da0dcbdf513161e7994682c54bf19cefe083af865fe6",

            "0xce454a18cd75f6702f7a065698c4799daa327bcb16c08898e8d212736efb5317",

            "0xd8addfb5ea034b07c956a1d447dbd691430cee0582bf5e42394d58022cf0f2dd",
            "0x6d3f83ebcd098ac8335b62dd9577ddea6ed1e2eacfb3dd140e2d34ab0a6dbaf4",
            "0x5bfa4b335bd2c609f616b2438e45da1d6d4a0222452cebab6e4e89da16b4de58",
            "0x6dc8fe1e76238c69bf65d13110d01787cbd173e00c481900ece1fcab68e969d7",
            "0xb86fc03d49d48c8da25d78133aea2a6e4899db17510811039add769823183d48",
            "0xb075262f72519807d4af8461d3a3e4beed372f591614713fee880fdba6406a38",

        "uncles": []
    }
}


3. 트랜잭션수 조회
<<< 요청
{	
	"jsonrpc":"2.0"
,	"method":"eth_getTransactionCount"
,	"params": [ "0x817f0c42831934fe10b89f545f7a1ab5ff1679e1", "0x5386bb"]
,	"id":1
}
>>> 응답
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "id": 1,
    "result": "0x1" // 1
}

4. 트랜잭션 영수증 조회
<<< 요청
{	
	"jsonrpc":"2.0"
,	"method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt"
,	"params": [ "0x71ce11bbec401eff4a04ab7c1d2c0de28b9ddbc813c790026b1c82170d440852"]
,	"id":1
}
>>> 응답 (컨트랙트 생성은 to 항목이 null)
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "id": 1,
    "result": {
        "blockHash": "0x8b80547a6889791992c567ccb0ca3c731740ab7090da85419d8f0ebcca1a5336",
        "blockNumber": "0x542faf",
        "contractAddress": null,
        "cumulativeGasUsed": "0x3800c",
        "from": "0x3cd9f8b8862c6f2f0c04d0ff3adacd69bd50d44e",
        "gasUsed": "0x3800c",
        "logs": [
            {
                "address": "0x50da6aa5b044bd30b160effda3c1a614cb2370fa",
                "blockHash": "0x8b80547a6889791992c567ccb0ca3c731740ab7090da85419d8f0ebcca1a5336",
                "blockNumber": "0x542faf",
                "data": "",
                "logIndex": "0x0",
                "removed": false,
                "topics": [
                    "0x0c4b4d509de37fabf3c5ecde4bc6691e1571594f41511e94a890de070877026b",
                    "0x0000000000000000000000003cd9f8b8862c6f2f0c04d0ff3adacd69bd50d44e"
                ],
                "transactionHash": "0x71ce11bbec401eff4a04ab7c1d2c0de28b9ddbc813c790026b1c82170d440852",
                "transactionIndex": "0x0"
            },
            {
                "address": "0x50da6aa5b044bd30b160effda3c1a614cb2370fa",
                "blockHash": "0x8b80547a6889791992c567ccb0ca3c731740ab7090da85419d8f0ebcca1a5336",
                "blockNumber": "0x542faf",
                "data": "0x00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000435954593de0d05824215611d2fe66c676330920ade78f2aa2fa6c8ff6a1513b30af4",
                "logIndex": "0x1",
                "removed": false,
                "topics": [
                    "0x393ea91a2ccbefa4f42432d1862d4d257233d07d4d1e0e94066e1168df203926",
                    "0x0000000000000000000000003cd9f8b8862c6f2f0c04d0ff3adacd69bd50d44e"
                ],
                "transactionHash": "0x71ce11bbec401eff4a04ab7c1d2c0de28b9ddbc813c790026b1c82170d440852",
                "transactionIndex": "0x0"
            }
        ],
        "logsBloom": "",
        "status": "0x1",
        "to": "0x50da6aa5b044bd30b160effda3c1a614cb2370fa",
        "transactionHash": "0x71ce11bbec401eff4a04ab7c1d2c0de28b9ddbc813c790026b1c82170d440852",
        "transactionIndex": "0x0"
    }
}


5. 지갑주소로 잔고 확인
<<< 요청
{	
	"jsonrpc":"2.0"
,	"method":"eth_getBalance"
,	"params": [ "0x3cd9f8b8862c6f2f0c04d0ff3adacd69bd50d44e", "latest"]
,	"id":1
}
>>> 응답
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "id": 1,
    "result": "0x35221d349f48fd699"
}
